::KitKat::

She groaned as pain ran through her body. Her leg hanging on by a 
steel rod and a few wires.  "I'll be ok." wincing at the pain.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit walked over to KitKat.
> "The CRs are offline. Let me look, I might be able to fix you up."
> He examined the wounds.
